plugin.name: Badges Plugin
plugin.author: Dan Hoover
plugin.description: A simple plugin to assign badges to your users. Badges can be added from the plugin config panel or automatically using built-in functions. You can have an unlimited number of badges and they're relatively easy to manage. New features include badges that automatically work with permission levels and user tags. Also includes new "category" badges which do not need to be tied to a user, but can be tied to other groups such as "teams" or "companies."
